name: Good Samitarian
description: Gain 1 Goodwill.

name: Window Shopping
description: Erase a shop card.

name: Spread Rumors
description: Inflict 1 Suspicion.

name: Sacrifice
description: Erase a card from your hand, gain Goodwill equal to its cost.

name: Charisma
description: Gain 2 Goodwill.

name: A Small Cost
description: Gain 2 Goodwill, erase a card in your hand.

name: Look the Other Way
description: Erase a shop card, draw a card.

name: Black Hole Sun
description: Win the game.

name: Mountain of Corpses
description: Draw 3 cards.

name: Eternal Youth
description: Inflict 2 Suspicion. Gain 3 Goodwill.

name: Forbidden Knowledge
description: Reveal the top three cards of the main deck. You may gain one. Erase the remainder.

name: Homonculus
description: Copy the effect of a card in your play area.

name: Daily Commute
description: Gain 1 Goodwill, draw a card.

name: Repeated Lie
description: Inflict 1 Suspicion for each time you've played Repeated Lie.

name: Investing in Yourself
description: Erase a card in your play area, draw a card.

name: Small Favor
description: Gain 3 Goodwill, erase this card.

name: Move On
description: Erase your hand and remove this card from play: If you have no cards, win the game.

name: Restless Coffin
description: Copy the effect of a random card in the Graveyard.

name: Fleeting Memories
description: Draw 2 cards, erase this card.

name: Ding Dong Ditch
description: When gained, put in opponent's discard pile. Does nothing.

name: Grave Robbery
description: Gain a card from the Graveyard for its regular cost. Self-inflict 1 suspicion.

name: Willing Posession
description: Reveal a random card from the Graveyard, copy its effect.

name: Hit Me
description: Reroll the last die you've rolled this game, earn its new result and effects.

name: Sliding Hands of Fate
description: After you roll a die, you may play this card to add +1 to the roll.

name: Lie Your Ass Off
description: Name a number - X. Roll the Die. If the die's result > X, inflict X Suspicion. Else, inflict it on yourself.

name: Begging
description: Roll the die. If you got a 5 or 6, gain 6 goodwill. Otherwise, that sucks.

name: Dumpster Diving
description: Roll the die, gain cards from the top of the main deck equal to your result. Erase this card.

name: Social Butterfly
description: Gain 2 Goodwill.

name: Keep Moving
description: Draw 2 Cards.

name: Calm Afternoon
description: Gain 1 Goodwill, draw a card.

name: A Moment of Solace
description: Draw 2 cards. Opponent draws a card.

name: Wonder of Nature
description: Gain 3 Goodwill.

name: Risky Move
description: Gain 3 Goodwill and 2 Suspicion.

name: Maximum Effort
description: Draw 3 cards.

name: Reconsider
description: Draw 2 cards, discard a card.

name: "I've Heard That.."
description: Every time you draw a card this turn, Inflict 1 Suspicion.

name: Planted Evidence
description: Erase a card from your play area, inflict 2 Suspicion.

name: Heartfelt Plea
description: Inflict 3 Suspicion.

name: Rile Them Up
description: Inflict 4 Suspicion.

name: Yapping
description: Inflict 2 suspicion. If the suspicion gauge is 5+ against you, inflict 4.

name: Misplaced Blame
description: Inflict 1 Suspicion. Erase a card in your play area to repeat this effect; you may do this more than once.

name: Learn and Adapt
description: Repeat the effect of a card in your play area.

name: You're Overthinking Things
description: Discard your play area, reduce 2 Suspicion.

name: Space Out
description: Draw a card.

name: Quick Thinking
description: Draw 2 cards, erase a card in your hand.

name: Sincerest Flattery
description: Copy the effect of a card in your play area.
